aws_access_key_id: <The access key to use when creating the client>
aws_secret_access_key: <The secret key to use when creating the client>
target_bucket_key: <Destination bucket and key folder in the format of {bucket}/{key}>
target_schema_bucket_key: <OPTIONAL: Schema destination bucket and key folder in the format of {bucket}/{key}>
region_name: <OPTIONAL: AWS Region where bucket resides or will be created>
use_ssl: <OPTIONAL: DEFAULT: true; Whether or not to use SSL>
verify: <OPTIONAL: DEFAULT: true; Whether or not to verify SSL certificates>
aws_session_token: OPTIONAL: The session token to use when creating the client
include_timestamp: <OPTIONAL: DEFAULT 'true' If 'false' is passed, then the timestamp will be omitted from target filenames>
